text: Donato Oliverio (Cosenza, 5 March 1956) is the Bishop of the Eparchy of Lungro, a diocese of the Italo-Albanian Catholic Church in Calabria, Italy. He replaced the most rev. Ercole Lupinacci. ==Episcopal genealogy== * Archbishop Nilo Isvoroff * Bishop Michael Petkov * Archbishop Michael Mirov * Eparch Isaias Papadopoulos * Eparch Giovanni Mele * Eparch Giovanni Stamati * Eparch Ercole Lupinacci * Eparch Donato Oliverio ==References== == External links == *Eparchy's Bishop page Category:Italian bishops Category:Italian Eastern Catholics Category:Italian people of Arbëreshë descent Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:People from Cosenza Category:Italo-Albanian Greek Catholic Church
title: Donato Oliverio
